alert.note: Alert for Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Wabash; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 6:26PM EDT until August 17 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wabash County in north central Indiana... Northeastern Grant County in central Indiana... Northern Blackford County in east central Indiana... Southwestern Huntington County in northeastern Indiana... Southwestern Wells County in northeastern Indiana... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 626 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Van Buren to near La Fontaine, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Gas City, Montpelier, La Fontaine, Van Buren, Warren, Mcnatts, Home Corner, Landess, Jalapa, Hanfield, Treaty, Banquo, Roll, Lake Wood, Arcana, and Pleasant Plain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
